titles.title: Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2013
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Pike National Historic Trail.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/12/2013--Introduced. Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2013 - Amends the National Trails System Act to require a study for the designation of Pike's Trail, a series of routes that follow the route taken by Lt. Zebulon Montgomery Pike during the 1806-1807 Pike expedition that began in Fort Bellefontaine, Missouri, and ended in Natchitoches, Louisiana, as a national historic trail.
